question: Can we get toys like dolls and bears for our kids which have eyes nose and ears etc. What if we cover the eyes of the toys can we then use it?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissible to give Dolls and bears as toys to children. (Fayzul
Baari vol.3)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
